reviews.review_msg: Sheila is very intelligent and anyone taking a class with her should be thankful. Learning about Chaucer from Sheila is the equivalent of having Jesus teach you the New Testament. People are bitter because they do not read, or cannot handle the heat of the intellectual content of the course. Don't take this course if you aren't willing to work.

Obviously those who wrote horrible comments about Sheila are slackers and deserve to feel bad.  She's a wonderful prof.   I was afraid of taking Chaucer because I'm not a middle-english fan but it's my best class and I'm considering doing an honours paper in that area because of her--she's great so suck it up--perhaps it's you and not her!!

Amazing prof. Knows her stuff.Doesn't waste your time and has little patience for those who waste hers. Extremely intolerant of the unprepared so don't take this course if you're hoping to sleep through it. If you're willing to put in the effort, though, she is one of the best profs in the university.
